titleStmt.title: The surueyor in foure bookes by Aaron Rathborne
titleStmt.author: Rathborne, Aaron.
Hole, William, d. 1624, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W: Stansby for, W: Burre,

notesStmt.note: The title page is engraved and signed: W.H. fe., i.e. William Hole.
The first leaf is blank; the last bears an engraved portrait of the author.
Leaf O3 is a cancel; verso line 5 has "58 4/5". Variant: O3 is cancellandum; line 3 has "54 4/5".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
